title: Who would win, Ezra vs Sabine? - Quora

response.answer_text: Sabine, honestly. She’s a Mandalorian, from house Vizsla no less. It’s in her blood, and she knows what she’s doing. She’s more resourceful and combat-wise: she’d know how to react better and faster than Ezra. Without his (somewhat lacking) training and Force abilities, he probably couldn’t beat two battle droids at once. Sabine’s been fighting the good fight a lot longer than him, and she’s been through most of the Imperial Academy on Mandalore. There may come a time that Ezra’s abilities surpass Sabine’s, but for the time being, she’s a badass and he’s… well, significantly less of a badass.
